channel.title: Collaborations on AHRS for Stratux
channel.description: Recent content in Collaborations on AHRS for Stratux

item.title: Collaboration
item.description:
Issues

Submit any issues on my fork’s issues area. Every flight creates a file in /var/log/sensors_YYYYMMDD_HHMMSS.csv, which you can upload. It might also be helpful to upload /var/log/stratux.log in certain situations.

Feedback

Please contact me on Slack, either with a direct message or in the ahrs channel.

If you’re not on Slack, you can use one of the links at left.

Acknowledgments

I would like to thank Steve Sokol of http://openflightsolutions.com for his input, motivation through his AHRS Challenge, and for providing a prototype AHRS board for testing. His products are also top notch–highly recommended!
